name: PhotogrammetrySession
desc: An object that manages the creation of 3D objects from photographs.

items.name: init(input: URL, configuration: PhotogrammetrySession.Configuration)
items.desc: Creates a session from images in a specified directory URL.

items.name: init<S>(input: S, configuration: PhotogrammetrySession.Configuration)
items.desc: Creates a session from a sequence of samples.

items.name: struct PhotogrammetrySession.Configuration
items.desc: The configuration parameters for a photogrammetry session.

items.name: var isProcessing: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the session is currently processing a request.

items.name: var outputs: PhotogrammetrySession.Outputs
items.desc: An asynchronous sequence of status updates for this session.

items.name: enum PhotogrammetrySession.Output
items.desc: Status updates on the object-creation process.

items.name: enum PhotogrammetrySession.Request
items.desc: An object that configures a photogrammetry session.

items.name: enum PhotogrammetrySession.Result
items.desc: An object that holds the created 3D object.
